DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare rate extent absorption topiramate 25 mg capsule ( test ) versus Topamax® ( reference ) administer 2 x 25 mg capsule fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Topiramate 25 mg Capsules Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Criteria Evaluation : FDA Bioequivalence Criteria Statistical Methods : FDA bioequivalence statistical method
DOC.criteria: Subjects females and/or male , nonsmoker , 18 year age old Subjects read , sign date Informed Consent Form prior study procedure . Female subject postmenopausal surgically sterilize . Post menopausal status define absence menses past 12 month bilateral oophorectomy least 6 month ago hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy least 6 month ago . Sterile status define hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy tubal ligation aat least 6 month ago . Clinically significant illness within 4 week administration study medication . Clinically significant surgery within 4 week prior administration study medication . Any history presence significant neurological , hepatic , renal , endocrinal , cardiovascular , pulmonary , hematologic , immunologic , psychiatric metabolic disease . Any clinically significant abnormality find medical screening . Abnormal laboratory test judge clinically significant . Positive urine drug screen screen . Positive alcohol breath test screening . Subjects use tobacco form eligible participate study . Three month abstinence require . Positive test hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV screen . ECG vital sign abnormality ( clinically significant ) . Subjects BMI great equal 30.0 . History significant alcohol abuse within 6 month screen visit indication regular use two unit alcohol per day ( 1 Unit = 150 mL wine 360 mL beer 45 mL alcohol 40 % ) . History drug abuse use illegal drug : use soft drug ( marijuana ) within 3 month screen visit hard drug ( cocaine , phencyclidine ( PCP ) crack ) within 1 year screen visit . Any food allergy , intolerance , restriction special diet , opinion medical subinvestigator , contraindicate subject participation study . History allergic reaction topiramate . Use drug know induce inhibit hepatic drug metabolism , use investigational drug participation investigational study within 30 day prior administration study medication . Use prescription medication within 14 day prior administration study medication overthecounter product within 7 day prior administration study medication , except topical product without systemic absorption . Donation plasma ( 500 mL ) within 7 day donation significant loss whole blood ( 500 mL ) within 56 day prior administration study medication . Any reason , opinion medical subinvestigator , would prevent subject participate study . Additional exclusion criterion female : • Positive urine pregnancy test screening ( performed female ) .
